snippet.title: Aegis Force Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3154550/Aegis_Force_The_Scorian_War/

Trailer for our new 2.5 pixel art Strategy RPG, entitled Aegis Force: The Scorian War. Follow us for updates and more details as well as play our demo and wishlist us on Steam! It is inspired by classic JRPGs and Strategy RPGs such as Fire Emblem, Shining Force 2, Final Fantasy Tactics, Final Fantasy 6, Chrono Trigger, and more.

Here are some more details for the game:

Aegis Force is a single player, story-driven, strategy RPG (SRPG) that has an engaging grid-based tactical combat system. It is designed in a 2.5d pixel art style reminiscent of classic pixel art JRPGS. Players can recruit for and customize their party, using gameplay that includes full world and town exploration. Set on the fantasy continent of Ianua, the game offers emotionally-driven cinematic storytelling where players will lead their characters through a unique world full of races, creatures, and monstrosities as they journey down unexpected paths. 

There are no random battles, allowing you the feely explore. Players can choose to engage enemies while exploring, as well as fight their way through story-essential tactical battles. Each battle gives players a chance to prove their mettle using a combination of movement, placement, attacks, spells, and team-up tech attacks.

Join Callon and his friends as they uncover enemies and allies, tackle surprising challenges, and deal with the machinations of powerful figures dead set on reshaping the future in their image. See how your characters and their relationships grow during their journey. Tactical victory or agonizing defeat… the choice is yours.
